thread.title: GoPro a Cause helps you get involved in social justice issues
thread.title_full: GoPro for a Cause helps you get involved in social justice issues - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: GoPro a Cause helps you get involved in social justice issues
text: SAN FRANCISCO — GoPro has introduced a new program aimed at helping promote social causes in order to engage and inspire people to participate. Called GoPro for a Cause, the company will be providing technical, production, marketing, and financial support to organizations doing some good in the world. On stage at the TechCrunch Disrupt conference, […] »
